Its modern black chrome metal basket cage style and warm comfortable light creates the romantic and elegant atmosphere, which is unique lamp wherever you put it in.

🎅【High-Quality】 Its frame base design was combined with spray paint and high temperature furnace fixation technology, which is enduring, durable and aesthetic. Also, it will be a best choice for you to give a gift for your friends, lover, family!

🎄【Safety & Easy To Use】 The cord and plug of the black table lamp are UL listed which is no any security risks. An ON/OFF button on the black power cord is convenient to use. It’s a lighter weight lamp, easy to move to any place where you have lighting needs. Easy to assemble. Very nice minimalist light for the right price!

🎅【For your dedicated service】 HAITRAL provide satisfactory service：30-day return.Confidence comes from high quality and our constant pursuit of perfection. We believe that you will like our HAITRAL beside table lamps, but if for some reason you are not satisfied, please let us know, we will help you solve it within 24 hours and make you satisfied. Please add to cart now.
body.description: HAITRAL Farmhouse Lamp Simple & Minimalist Design The small table lamp is constructed of high-quality metal frame and linen shade that provide a modern stylish feeling. It’s a great bedside lamp, office lamp, reading lamp, kids room lamp, living room table lamp, essentially anywhere that is needed for added brightness. The black metal table lamp looks modern but also retro with black chrome metal basket cage style base and fabric lamp shade, never out of fashion. Its special boho style and warm comfortable lighting creates the romantic and elegant atmosphere for your room, which is unique decoration lamp wherever you put.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Click "HAITRAL" to enter brand flagship store，SEE MORE modern table lamps for indoor. Did you still find a small black table lamp for your small side table？This will be your nice choice！ HAITRAL black table lamp with fabric lampshade, soft lighting, lampshade with high permeability fabric, protect your eyes from direct lighting.It is the best choice for a small table lamp at your home.Upgraded metal frame black spray paint base, make this desk lamp stand stably on your table, durable and not rusty.The exquisite and elegant appearance adds a sense of tranquility and comfort to you. It is very refreshing and eyes catching when placed in any bedroom, guest bedroom, kids room, reading room, and living room. About the Bulbs we suggest you using: - LED Bulb: 4W-6W - Energy Saving Bulb: 8W-11W - Incandescent Bulb: 15W-25W(110V, 60W Max)

-----Details of the Black Table Lamp ----- Fabric Lamp Shade The tan fabric shade softens the light, creating a warm, beautiful and comfortable feeling for any room,protect your eyes from direct light. Switch on Cable ON-OFF switch on the black cord is near the lamp base, just about 7.8 inches (20 cm), easy to use. (Non-touch Switch) Bulb Requirement Bulb Not Included. The black metal bedside table lamp required an E26 regular bulb, Max 60 watt. Black Metal Base The black hollowed-out diamond-shaped base was combined with spray paint and high temperature furnace fixation technology, which is enduring, durable and aesthetic.

HAITRAL Farmhouse Lamp Simple & Minimalist Design The small table lamp is constructed of high-quality metal frame and linen shade that provide a modern stylish feeling. It’s a great bedside lamp, office lamp, reading lamp, kids room lamp, living room table lamp, essentially anywhere that is needed for added brightness. The black metal table lamp looks modern but also retro with black chrome metal basket cage style base and fabric lamp shade, never out of fashion. Its special boho style and warm comfortable lighting creates the romantic and elegant atmosphere for your room, which is unique decoration lamp wherever you put. Specification: Shade Color: Linen Frame Color: Black Shade Material: Fiber Flax / Fabric Frame Material: Metal Bulb Wattage: Max 60W Switch Type: Button Switch Bulb Base: E26（Bulb isn’t included in the package) The Length of Power Cord: about 67 inches

-----HAITRAL Black Metal Table Lamp -13.8 x 7.1 x 4.7 inches ----- Size of the Lamp Lamp dimension - 13.8 x 7.1 x 4.7 inches, the lamp is designed as small cage lamp, please pay attention to the size of lamp before buying! (Please be clear about the size when you browse) Warm & Soft Lighting for Any Room Its linen fabric shade softens the light, creating a warm, beautiful and comfortable space for any room in your home or office. Its unique design can catch eyes instantly is perfect light in a beautiful modern house for a modest, refined look in beautiful lighting ! As a Small Bedside Lamp for Bedroom The lamp was design as minimalist and morden style, it's a perfect choice as a bedside lamp to creative a warm and soft light on the nightstand table. You could find the ON-OFF switch on the cord which is near the lamp base, just about 7.8 inches.It's easy to use.

----- How to install ----- 1. Unscrew the plastic ring When you received this lamp, the lampshade is placed on the base in reverse, and it was fixed by a plastic lamp ring.Please unscrew the plastic ring, remove the lampshade. 2. Upside down the lamp shade Then turn the lamp shade over and place it on the black metal lamp base. 3. Fixing the lamp shade by the ring Then tighten the plastic lamp fixing ring to the lamp holder again to achieve the effect of fixing the lamp shade to avoid the lampshade wobble. 4. Install an E26 Max60 bulb （not included） Finally, you need an E26 screw bulb (Package Not Included the Bulb), easily screw it in the lamp socket, and test whether it works normally If you encounter any problems during the installation process, please send us a message and we will provide you the best solution as soon as possible.
Kindly Tips: Any problem,please feel free to tell us by email,we will solve it and give you a good solution ASAP!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is a small scale lamp perfect for a small night table. Very stylish and gray shade is a great color!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars perfect for what I needed and wanted
reviews.reviewText: Perfect lamp for my mantel in our dining room. Gives just the right amount of light needed when darkness comes. Very easy assembly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Perfect size and looks great with my decor

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute little lamp
reviews.reviewText: Much smaller than I thought. I have a habit of not always looking at the product details. But I can use it in a bathroom or reading nook.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect table lamps for our home!
reviews.reviewText: These lamps really fill the bill for on top the cabinets in our (too dark, poorly lighted) rental kitchen and as bedroom table lamps, as I'll explain below. I'm impressed that there are several color combinations of lamps and shades to choose from and that the dimensions (4.7"D x 7.1"W x 13.8"H) were included in the Amazon sales page advert. Knowing the anticipated size ahead of shipment, by measuring the space to be filled vs the size of the item, always makes me a satisfied customer.As other reviewers have mentioned, these are attractive little table lamps. I like that the lamp bases allow us to see "through" them. This is an unexpected look that gives the appearance of more open space for any location. We have also placed a 19" high lamp and a 32" high lamp in similar colors and slightly different shaped lampshades on the bedside tables and a nearby console table for more light and visual appeal. (Hmmmm - thinking two more complementary lamps of different heights, say 11" and 25", would complete the look for me.)So I'm having fun with placement of these sturdy, reasonably-priced little Haitral lamps in our rental home, in juxtaposition with other lamps and decor pieces. I'm glad we bought them!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Perfect sized lamp to set on our kitchen counter at our AirBnB to warm up the kitchen/dining area.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great little lamp!
reviews.reviewText: Very sturdy for such a small lamp

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Aesthetically, it’s cute. I love the look. But functionally, the shade hardware is of poor quality and doesn’t fit flush. If you’re looking to buy just for its cuteness but don’t plan to touch it, I’d recommend. But if you’re gonna touch it, be prepared to fight with the shade daily.

Es muy bonita, queda perfecto en oficina o en habitación. Es ligera, la tela de la pantalla es de buena calidad.En general todo vale la pena, ya dependerá del foco que se le ponga para que dé otro aspecto al lugar.

reviews.reviewTitle: Perfect size and fit for me. Just what I was looking for
reviews.reviewText: I needed a small lamp that did not take up much space on an already busy cabinet top ( I am a collector) in a hallway off my kitchen on the way to a small washroom. I purchased several lamps and none worked for me so gave away or put elsewhere. This lamp is the perfect size and hollowed out base makes the lamp appear smaller than is, plus I very much like the design and colour. I did replace the original shade with one black, and just better for where it sits on the cabinet…personal taste. The lighter lamp shade is attractive and I am using that on another lamp. Nice lamp and good quality and value.
Es una lámpara muy bonita, excelente para un buró como luz de noche.
Lampe design au goût du jour et le modèle est vraiment beau

This is a really pretty lamp, and I love the colour of the shade. The only issue is, the shade doesn't sit tightly on the base, so if you nudge it, the shade becomes off centered. Other than that, it's great.
